resources.string: paste the link to a light novel
we do not yet support this website
would you like to save this novel?
select the directory to save the exported novel to, make sure you have enough storage space. please allow permission to save this novel.
depending on the number of chapters this could take a while \n\ndo not close the app while the downloading is in progress. thanks!
paste link of light novel you would like to download from your favourite website.
we connect to website and read all relevant data and create a readable epub from all the chapters
you can import the epub in your favourite epub reader
this source is not supported, see sources list
enter the name of the novel you are looking for
watch a video ad to continue with the download, this helps the app be free while supporting your purpose. thanks for watching the ad.
